title: New emotes for Soraka, Graves, and a tent

replies.body:
I'm obviously purchasing the Soraka one but I'm pissed that it's fire and coffee. WTF does that have to do with soraka? 

I wish they gave her praying hands anime girl instead.

its a meme reference.

 https://www.google.com/search?q=this+is+fine+meme&rlz=1C1DKCZ_enUS763US763&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiOoa60hbHaAhUJw1QKHQM8CJYQsAQIKA&biw=1920&bih=949#imgrc=UEGISB5nqP9vkM:
Okay, but what does it have to do with Raka?

I think it's more a support problem. And Soraka is an iconic/perfect fit for the 'true support' role.

Basically if everyone else is doing shit, you're going to be helpless, because you're entire job is make openings for non-shit players to get their stuff done.

So your only options are to rage, or sit back and sip coffee/tea/coco and watch the world burn down around you.
i feel this constantly as a soraka main.
Would you have preferred that made it a Nasus emote? you know cuz dog
Fun Fact: If you google "Soraka this is fine" there's a good chance you'll see a Nasus as well.

You know how that guy Googled "This is fine meme"?
Go Google "Soraka this is fine".

https://giphy.com/gifs/leagueoflegends-l2Sq2Iw6xwrlzrLs4
It's not so much a reference to Soraka as it is a reference to the player who's playing Soraka. Personally I love it and it's so perfect lmao.
Now instead of flaming the enemy jungler for camping you can just buy this emote at a ~~low~~ high cost for $450 RP!
As a jungle main I need to get that tent one.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
*Spams This Raka emote and thinkingblitz every time my ADC misses a cannon*

That Soraka emote is everything. xD
It shall be spammed thoroughly.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I hope I get one is a chest!....




what, you thought I'd BUY these??? you must be silly.
This is Riot’s way of embracing the memes!
penguin sale plzzzzzzz
Soraka's hopes and dreams, GONE
Everyone has been waiting for this tent emote. lmao
first! and lol the camping one. {{sticker:galio-happy}}
